ISSUE.TITLE: Can't save the modal when adding a team role to an organization
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY The save button in this screenshot doesn't always work: ![Screenshot from 2020-03-26 09-39-57](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19942822/77653157-c9f62600-6f45-11ea-87d1-8c2ad40e1d12.png) ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE 1. Make a team and org, put the team inside the org. 2. Go to org -> Access tab -> add a team permission 3. Try to give the team admin permissions. ##### EXPECTED RESULTS Clicking the save button works, or presents an error. ##### ACTUAL RESULTS No visual feedback, the button appears to not respond. The network tab presents a 400: ```{"msg":"You cannot assign an Organization participation role as a child role for a Team."}```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove custom login info form tags and its inner contents (#6435)
